CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobility of the pristine PSFDTBT film spin - cast from o-dichlorobenzene ( DCB ) solution is 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 with on / off ratios in the order of 10^5 .

Let's think step by step.

1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the material, specifically a type of organic semiconductor film.
2. o-dichlorobenzene (DCB): This is also a material, specifically a type of solvent used for spin-casting the PSFDTBT film.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobility of the pristine PSFDTBT film spin - cast from o-dichlorobenzene ( DCB ) solution is 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 with on / off ratios in the order of 10^5 .

Let's think step by step.

1. hole mobility: This is a physical property that describes the ease with which holes (positive charge carriers) can move through a material.
2. pristine PSFDTBT film: This is a material or substance, specifically a spin-cast film of PSFDTBT.
3. spin-cast: This is a method used to fabricate thin films.
4. o-dichlorobenzene (DCB): This is a chemical solvent used in the spin-casting process.

Therefore, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are: hole mobility and on / off ratios.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

The hole mobility of the pristine PSFDTBT film is 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1.

Here, the only relevant entity is "hole mobility" which is a material property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobility of the pristine PSFDTBT film spin - cast from o-dichlorobenzene ( DCB ) solution is 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 with on / off ratios in the order of 10^5 .

Let's think step by step.

1. Hole mobility: This is a property value, specifically the mobility of holes in the pristine PSFDTBT film. Its value is given as 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V-1 s^-1.
2. On / off ratios: This is also a property value, representing the ratio of the material's conductivity when it is "on" (conducting) to when it is "off" (not conducting). Its value is given as 10^5.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Hole mobility: 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V-1 s^-1
2. On / off ratios: 10^5

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Hole mobility: 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V-1 s^-1 |
| On / off ratios: 10^5 |
